alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 7:38PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT EASTERN CARROLL...NORTHEASTERN HARRISON...JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA...NORTHEASTERN BELMONT...BEAVER... WESTERN VENANGO...BUTLER...ALLEGHENY...NORTHWESTERN GREENE... SOUTHWESTERN ARMSTRONG...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...MERCER... WASHINGTON...LAWRENCE...WESTERN WESTMORELAND...OHIO...MARSHALL... BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EST... At 737 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Bristolville to 9 miles southeast of Valley Grove. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Gusty winds have a history of causing power outages. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Penn Hills, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, Wheeling, McCandless Township, Monroeville, Cranberry, Moon Township, New Castle, and McMurray. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 222 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 80. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 24 and 138. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 41. Parkway North between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango
